title: Efficient Jailbreak Mitigation Using Semantic Linear Classification in a Multi-Staged Pipeline
summary: Prompt injection and jailbreaking attacks pose persistent security challenges to large language model (LLM)-based systems. We present an efficient and systematically evaluated defense architecture that mitigates these threats through a lightweight, multi-stage pipeline.
